text: Serge Baguet (18 August 1969 - 9 February 2017) was a Belgian professional road bicycle racer. He started his professional cycling career in 1991. He worked for Lotto for five years and one year for Vlaanderen 2002. He was born in Brakel. Baguet was diagnosed with colon cancer in 2014. He died on 9 February 2017 in Sint-Lievens-Houtem, at the age of 47. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Cancer deaths in Belgium Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:People from East Flanders
title: Serge Baguet
